SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ttmt_role (`name`, description, created_time, updated_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, `name`, description, created_time, updated_time from ttmt_role
